SecurityPermission.description: View operations in the CMS Component.
Create operations in the CMS Component.
Update operations in the CMS Component.
Delete operations in the CMS Component.
ALL operations in the CMS Component.

SecurityGroup.description: CMS global admin group; all admin permissions for all CMS applications.
CMS global user group; all limited content permissions for all CMS applications.
CMS global user group; all read-only permissions for all CMS applications.
